Hunting.DisplayName: All Events
Hunting.Query:
Event | sort by TimeGenerated desc
// Oql: Type=Event // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PTT: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122
Hunting.name: LogManagement(accorinvest)_LogManagement|AllEvents

Hunting.DisplayName: Count of Events containing the word "started" grouped by EventID
Hunting.Query:
search in (Event) "started" | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by EventID
// Oql: Type=Event "started" | Measure count() by EventID // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PTT: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122
Hunting.name: LogManagement(accorinvest)_LogManagement|EventsWithStartedinEventID

Hunting.DisplayName: Count of Events grouped by Event Log
Hunting.Query:
Event | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by EventLog
// Oql: Type=Event | Measure count() by EventLog // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PTT: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122
Hunting.name: LogManagement(accorinvest)_LogManagement|EventsByEventLog

Hunting.DisplayName: Count of Events grouped by Event Source
Hunting.Query:
Event | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by Source
// Oql: Type=Event | Measure count() by Source // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PTT: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122
Hunting.name: LogManagement(accorinvest)_LogManagement|EventsByEventSource

Hunting.DisplayName: Count of Events grouped by Event ID
Hunting.Query:
Event | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by EventID
// Oql: Type=Event | Measure count() by EventID // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PTT: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122
Hunting.name: LogManagement(accorinvest)_LogManagement|EventsByEventsID

Hunting.DisplayName: All Events with level "Warning"
Hunting.Query:
Event | where EventLevelName == "warning" | sort by TimeGenerated desc
// Oql: Type=Event EventLevelName=warning // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PTT: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122
Hunting.name: LogManagement(accorinvest)_LogManagement|WarningEvents

Hunting.DisplayName: Count of Events with level "Warning" grouped by Event ID
Hunting.Query:
Event | where EventLevelName == "warning" | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by EventID
// Oql: Type=Event EventLevelName=warning | Measure count() by EventID // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PTT: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122
Hunting.name: LogManagement(accorinvest)_LogManagement|CountOfWarningEvents

Hunting.DisplayName: How many connections to Operations Manager's SDK service by day
Hunting.Query:
Event | where EventID == 26328 and EventLog == "Operations Manager" | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d) | sort by TimeGenerated desc
// Oql: Type=Event EventID=26328 EventLog="Operations Manager" | Measure count() interval 1DAY // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PTT: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122
Hunting.name: LogManagement(accorinvest)_LogManagement|NoOfConnectionsToOMSDKService

Hunting.DisplayName: Events in the Operations Manager Event Log whose Event ID is in the range between 2000 and 3000
Hunting.Query:
Event | where EventLog == "Operations Manager" and EventID >= 2000 and EventID <= 3000 | sort by TimeGenerated desc
// Oql: Type=Event EventLog="Operations Manager" EventID:[2000..3000] // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PTT: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122
Hunting.name: LogManagement(accorinvest)_LogManagement|EventsInOMBetween2000to3000

Hunting.DisplayName: When did my servers initiate restart?
Hunting.Query:
search in (Event) "shutdown" and EventLog == "System" and Source == "User32" and EventID == 1074 | sort by TimeGenerated desc | project TimeGenerated, Computer
// Oql: shutdown Type=Event EventLog=System Source=User32 EventID=1074 | Select TimeGenerated,Computer // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PTT: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122
Hunting.name: LogManagement(accorinvest)_LogManagement|ServerRestartTime

Hunting.DisplayName: Windows Firewall Policy settings have changed
Hunting.Query:
Event | where EventLog == "Microsoft-Windows-Windows Firewall With Advanced Security/Firewall" and EventID == 2008 | sort by TimeGenerated desc
// Oql: Type=Event EventLog="Microsoft-Windows-Windows Firewall With Advanced Security/Firewall" EventID=2008 // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PTT: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122
Hunting.name: LogManagement(accorinvest)_LogManagement|WindowsFireawallPolicySettingsChanged

Hunting.DisplayName: On which machines and how many times have Windows Firewall Policy settings changed
Hunting.Query:
Event | where EventLog == "Microsoft-Windows-Windows Firewall With Advanced Security/Firewall" and EventID == 2008 | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by Computer | limit 500000
// Oql: Type=Event EventLog="Microsoft-Windows-Windows Firewall With Advanced Security/Firewall" EventID=2008 | measure count() by Computer | top 500000 // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PTT: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122
Hunting.name: LogManagement(accorinvest)_LogManagement|WindowsFireawallPolicySettingsChangedByMachines

Hunting.DisplayName: All IIS Log Entries
Hunting.Query:
search * | extend Type = $table | where Type == W3CIISLog | sort by TimeGenerated desc
// Oql: Type=W3CIISLog // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PEF: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122
Hunting.name: LogManagement(accorinvest)_LogManagement|ListAllIISLogEntries

Hunting.DisplayName: Shows breakdown of response codes
Hunting.Query:
search * | extend Type = $table | where Type == W3CIISLog | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by scStatus
// Oql: Type=W3CIISLog | Measure count() by scStatus // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PEF: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122
Hunting.name: LogManagement(accorinvest)_LogManagement|DisplayBreakdownRespondCodes

Hunting.DisplayName: Find the maximum time taken for each page
Hunting.Query:
search * | extend Type = $table | where Type == W3CIISLog | summarize AggregatedValue = max(TimeTaken) by csUriStem
// Oql: Type=W3CIISLog | Measure Max(TimeTaken) by csUriStem // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PEF: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122
Hunting.name: LogManagement(accorinvest)_LogManagement|FindMaximumTimeTakenForEachPage

Hunting.DisplayName: Shows which pages people are getting a 404 for
Hunting.Query:
search scStatus == 404 | extend Type = $table | where Type == W3CIISLog | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by csUriStem
// Oql: Type=W3CIISLog scStatus=404 | Measure count() by csUriStem // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PEF: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122
Hunting.name: LogManagement(accorinvest)_LogManagement|Show404PagesList

Hunting.DisplayName: Average HTTP Request time by HTTP Method
Hunting.Query:
search * | extend Type = $table | where Type == W3CIISLog | summarize AggregatedValue = avg(TimeTaken) by csMethod
// Oql: Type=W3CIISLog | Measure Avg(TimeTaken) by csMethod // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PEF: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122
Hunting.name: LogManagement(accorinvest)_LogManagement|AverageHTTPRequestTimeHTTPMethod

Hunting.DisplayName: Shows servers that are throwing internal server error
Hunting.Query:
search scStatus == 500 | extend Type = $table | where Type == W3CIISLog | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by sComputerName
// Oql: Type=W3CIISLog scStatus=500 | Measure count() by sComputerName // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PEF: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122
Hunting.name: LogManagement(accorinvest)_LogManagement|ShowServersThrowingInternalServerError

Hunting.DisplayName: Count of IIS Log Entries by HTTP Request Method
Hunting.Query:
search * | extend Type = $table | where Type == W3CIISLog | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by csMethod
// Oql: Type=W3CIISLog | Measure count() by csMethod // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PEF: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122
Hunting.name: LogManagement(accorinvest)_LogManagement|CountIISLogEntriesHTTPRequestMethod

Hunting.DisplayName: Count of IIS Log Entries by HTTP User Agent
Hunting.Query:
search * | extend Type = $table | where Type == W3CIISLog | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by csUserAgent
// Oql: Type=W3CIISLog | Measure count() by csUserAgent // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PEF: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122
Hunting.name: LogManagement(accorinvest)_LogManagement|CountIISLogEntriesHTTPUserAgent

Hunting.DisplayName: Count of IIS Log Entries by Client IP Address
Hunting.Query:
search * | extend Type = $table | where Type == W3CIISLog | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by cIP
// Oql: Type=W3CIISLog | Measure count() by cIP // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PEF: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122
Hunting.name: LogManagement(accorinvest)_LogManagement|CountIISLogEntriesClientIPAddress

Hunting.DisplayName: IIS Log Entries for a specific client IP Address (replace with your own)
Hunting.Query:
search cIP == "192.168.0.1" | extend Type = $table | where Type == W3CIISLog | sort by TimeGenerated desc | project csUriStem, scBytes, csBytes, TimeTaken, scStatus
// Oql: Type=W3CIISLog cIP="192.168.0.1" | Select csUriStem,scBytes,csBytes,TimeTaken,scStatus // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PEF: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122
Hunting.name: LogManagement(accorinvest)_LogManagement|IISLogEntriesForClientIP

Hunting.DisplayName: Count of IIS Log Entries by URL requested by client (without query strings)
Hunting.Query:
search * | extend Type = $table | where Type == W3CIISLog | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by csUriStem
// Oql: Type=W3CIISLog | Measure count() by csUriStem // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PEF: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122
Hunting.name: LogManagement(accorinvest)_LogManagement|CountOfIISLogEntriesByURLRequestedByClient

Hunting.DisplayName: Count of IIS Log Entries by Host requested by client
Hunting.Query:
search * | extend Type = $table | where Type == W3CIISLog | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by csHost
// Oql: Type=W3CIISLog | Measure count() by csHost // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PEF: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122
Hunting.name: LogManagement(accorinvest)_LogManagement|CountOfIISLogEntriesByHostRequestedByClient

Hunting.DisplayName: Count of IIS Log Entries by URL for the host "www.contoso.com" (replace with your own)
Hunting.Query:
search csHost == "www.contoso.com" | extend Type = $table | where Type == W3CIISLog | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by csUriStem
// Oql: Type=W3CIISLog csHost="www.contoso.com" | Measure count() by csUriStem // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PEF: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122
Hunting.name: LogManagement(accorinvest)_LogManagement|CountOfIISLogEntriesByURLForHost

Hunting.DisplayName: Total Bytes sent by Client IP Address
Hunting.Query:
search * | extend Type = $table | where Type == W3CIISLog | summarize AggregatedValue = sum(csBytes) by cIP
// Oql: Type=W3CIISLog | Measure Sum(csBytes) by cIP // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PEF: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122
Hunting.name: LogManagement(accorinvest)_LogManagement|TotalBytesSentByClientIPAddress

Hunting.DisplayName: Total Bytes received by each Azure Role Instance
Hunting.Query:
search * | extend Type = $table | where Type == W3CIISLog | summarize AggregatedValue = sum(csBytes) by RoleInstance
// Oql: Type=W3CIISLog | Measure Sum(csBytes) by RoleInstance // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PEF: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122
Hunting.name: LogManagement(accorinvest)_LogManagement|TotalBytesReceivedByEachAzureRoleInstance

Hunting.DisplayName: Total Bytes received by each IIS Computer
Hunting.Query:
search * | extend Type = $table | where Type == W3CIISLog | summarize AggregatedValue = sum(csBytes) by Computer | limit 500000
// Oql: Type=W3CIISLog | Measure Sum(csBytes) by Computer | top 500000 // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PEF: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122
Hunting.name: LogManagement(accorinvest)_LogManagement|TotalBytesReceivedByEachIISComputer

Hunting.DisplayName: Total Bytes responded back to clients by each IIS ServerIP Address
Hunting.Query:
search * | extend Type = $table | where Type == W3CIISLog | summarize AggregatedValue = sum(scBytes) by sIP
// Oql: Type=W3CIISLog | Measure Sum(scBytes) by sIP // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PEF: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122
Hunting.name: LogManagement(accorinvest)_LogManagement|TotalBytesRespondedToClientsByEachIISServerIPAddress

Hunting.DisplayName: Total Bytes responded back to clients by Client IP Address
Hunting.Query:
search * | extend Type = $table | where Type == W3CIISLog | summarize AggregatedValue = sum(scBytes) by cIP
// Oql: Type=W3CIISLog | Measure Sum(scBytes) by cIP // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PEF: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122
Hunting.name: LogManagement(accorinvest)_LogManagement|TotalBytesRespondedToClientsByClientIPAddress

Hunting.DisplayName: Average HTTP Request time by Client IP Address
Hunting.Query:
search * | extend Type = $table | where Type == W3CIISLog | summarize AggregatedValue = avg(TimeTaken) by cIP
// Oql: Type=W3CIISLog | Measure Avg(TimeTaken) by cIP // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PEF: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122
Hunting.name: LogManagement(accorinvest)_LogManagement|AverageHTTPRequestTimeByClientIPAddress

Hunting.DisplayName: All Syslogs
Hunting.Query:
Syslog | sort by TimeGenerated desc
// Oql: Type=Syslog // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PTT: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122
Hunting.name: LogManagement(accorinvest)_LogManagement|AllSyslog

Hunting.DisplayName: All Syslog Records with Errors
Hunting.Query:
Syslog | where SeverityLevel == "error" | sort by TimeGenerated desc
// Oql: Type=Syslog SeverityLevel=error // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PTT: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122
Hunting.name: LogManagement(accorinvest)_LogManagement|AllSyslogsWithErrors

Hunting.DisplayName: All Syslog Records grouped by Facility
Hunting.Query:
Syslog | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by Facility
// Oql: Type=Syslog | Measure count() by Facility // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PTT: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122
Hunting.name: LogManagement(accorinvest)_LogManagement|AllSyslogByFacility

Hunting.DisplayName: All Syslog Records grouped by ProcessName
Hunting.Query:
Syslog | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by ProcessName
// Oql: Type=Syslog | Measure count() by ProcessName // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PTT: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122
Hunting.name: LogManagement(accorinvest)_LogManagement|AllSyslogByProcessName

Hunting.DisplayName: Which Management Group is generating the most data points?
Hunting.Query:
search * | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by ManagementGroupName
// Oql: * | Measure count() by ManagementGroupName // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PTT: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122
Hunting.name: LogManagement(accorinvest)_General|dataPointsPerManagementGroup

Hunting.DisplayName: Distribution of data Types
Hunting.Query:
search * | extend Type = $table | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by Type
// Oql: * | Measure count() by Type // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PTT: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122
Hunting.name: LogManagement(accorinvest)_General|dataTypeDistribution

Hunting.DisplayName: All Computers with their most recent data
Hunting.Query:
search not(ObjectName == "Advisor Metrics" or ObjectName == "ManagedSpace") | summarize AggregatedValue = max(TimeGenerated) by Computer | limit 500000 | sort by Computer asc
// Oql: NOT(ObjectName="Advisor Metrics" OR ObjectName=ManagedSpace) | measure max(TimeGenerated) by Computer | top 500000 | Sort Computer // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PTT: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122
Hunting.name: LogManagement(accorinvest)_General|AlphabeticallySortedComputers

Hunting.DisplayName: Stale Computers (data older than 24 hours)
Hunting.Query:
search not(ObjectName == "Advisor Metrics" or ObjectName == "ManagedSpace") | summarize lastdata = max(TimeGenerated) by Computer | limit 500000 | where lastdata < ago(24h)
// Oql: NOT(ObjectName="Advisor Metrics" OR ObjectName=ManagedSpace) | measure max(TimeGenerated) as lastdata by Computer | top 500000 | where lastdata < NOW-24HOURS // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000} // Settings: {PTT: True; SortI: True; SortF: True} // Version: 0.1.122
Hunting.name: LogManagement(accorinvest)_General|StaleComputers
